= Alfred = 
== Workflows ==
=== Lastpass ===
* lp <application name> - lookup. 
* lpsettimeout <number of seconds> - timeout until logout
* lplogin - Log in to LastPass
* lplogout - Log out of LastPass
* lp Search Lastpass vault for item containing , press return to copy to clipboard.
* Shift modifier can be used on lp to copy the username.

=== Spotify mini player ===
* shift + cmd + enter - toggle
* shift + cmd + ? - current song. 

=== Strong password generator ===
* sp <number of characters>
